title: Theodoros Kotakos
text: Theodoros Kotakos (born 10 April 1976) is a Greek <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202004%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a>.
